markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 33 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 [Yana No-Trail](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1820) **Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 7 **Perception** +13; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Skald](/Languages.aspx?ID=42); [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +17, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +17, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +17 **Str** +1 **Dex** +4 **Con** +1 **Int** +3 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +4 **Items** [_standard potion of flying_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=189) --- **AC** 25 **Fort** +14 **Ref** +19 **Will** +11 **HP** 110 **Resistances** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 3 **Cold Tolerant** Yana treats [environmental cold effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=642) as if they were one step less extreme.
**Evasion** When Yana rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead.
**Nimble Dodge** **Trigger** Yana is targeted by a melee or ranged attack from an attacker he can see; **Effect** Yana gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 25 feet, climb 10 feet **Melee** claw +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 2d4+3 slashing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 23 - **2nd** [Animal Messenger](/Spells.aspx?ID=11), [Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) (at will) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Kitsune](/Traits.aspx?ID=341), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) Yana can transform into an Ulfen [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6), Tiny fox, or hybrid kitsune form. Using Change Shape counts as creating a disguise for the [Impersonate](/Actions.aspx?ID=46) use of [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5). He can remain in any of his forms indefinitely. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** Yana deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.
name: Yana No-Trail

text: Yana No-Trail Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 33 Unspecific Lore : DC 31 Specific Lore : DC 28 Yana No-Trail Source Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra pg. 7 Perception +13; low-light vision Languages Common, Hallit, Jotun, Skald; speak with animals Skills Acrobatics +17, Deception +17, Diplomacy +17, Society +16, Stealth +17, Thievery +17 Str +1 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +3 Wis +0 Cha +4 Items standard potion of flying --- AC 25 Fort +14 Ref +19 Will +11 HP 110 Resistances cold 3 Cold Tolerant Yana treats environmental cold effects as if they were one step less extreme. Evasion When Yana rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead. Nimble Dodge Reaction Trigger Yana is targeted by a melee or ranged attack from an attacker he can see; Effect Yana gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- Speed 25 feet, climb 10 feet Melee Single Action claw +19 (Agile, Finesse, Unarmed), Damage 2d4+3 slashing Primal Innate Spells DC 23 - 2nd Animal Messenger, Speak with Animals (at will) Change Shape Single Action (Concentrate, Divine, Kitsune, Polymorph, Transmutation) Yana can transform into an Ulfen human, Tiny fox, or hybrid kitsune form. Using Change Shape counts as creating a disguise for the Impersonate use of Deception. He can remain in any of his forms indefinitely. Sneak Attack Yana deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.
